name: Text The Check
overview:
Using our Mobile Payment Gateway any business can allow customers to pay bills or subscription costs with a simple text message from the customer’s cell phone. Any business can sign up for an account (FREE) and have access to the TextTheCheck CRM web site. Once customers are created and bills generated, a text message is sent to the customers so they know the bill amount and can pay it by responding to the text message.

Using our Restaurant Gateway, TextTheCheck can connect into a restuarants POS and allow payment of dining checks using the Mobile Payment Gateway. Restaurants also have access to our TextAhead seating, TextTakeout, Electronic Coupons, Text Marketing and Cash Rewards program.

With our FundUP! program patrons can also opt in to donate money to their favorite local public school group (Drama Club, BETA Club, Sports Boosters, etc) each time they use TextTheCheck to pay for anything. It is a win - win for everyone!
